title: BRIEF-Sotherly Hotels Says On Feb 26, Affiliates Of Co, Entered First Amendment To Loan Agreement
text: February 27, 2018 / 1:49 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Sotherly Hotels Says On Feb 26, Affiliates Of Co, Entered First Amendment To Loan Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 27 (Reuters) - Sotherly Hotels LP: * SOTHERLY HOTELS LP - ON FEB 26, AFFILIATES OF CO, ENTERED FIRST AMENDMENT TO LOAN AGREEMENT - SEC FILING * SOTHERLY HOTELS LP - ‍ PURSUANT TO AMENDMENT, LOAN HAS INITIAL PRINCIPAL BALANCE OF $15 MILLION, WITH NO ADDITIONAL PRINCIPAL AVAILABLE​ * SOTHERLY HOTELS LP - PURSUANT TO THE AMENDMENT, MATURITY DATE IS EXTENDED UNTIL FEBRUARY 26, 2023 Source text: ( bit.ly/2BRECHI ) Further company coverage:
